cases.name: english_lit_hf_example
documents: 'To Kill a Mockingbird' is a novel by Harper Lee published in 1960. It was immediately successful, winning the Pulitzer Prize, and has become a classic of modern American literature.
The novel 'Moby-Dick' was written by Herman Melville and first published in 1851.
Harper Lee, an American novelist widely known for her novel 'To Kill a Mockingbird', was born in 1926 in Monroeville, Alabama.
Jane Austen was an English novelist known primarily for her six major novels.
The 'Harry Potter' series was written by British author J.K. Rowling.
'The Great Gatsby' is by F. Scott Fitzgerald.

cases.name: zh_multilingual
documents: 《百年孤独》是哥伦比亚作家加西亚·马尔克斯的代表作。
鲁迅是中国现代文学的重要作家。
村上春树的代表作包括《挪威的森林》。
托尔斯泰写了《战争与和平》。

cases.name: code_api
documents: enumerate(iterable, start=0) returns (index, item) pairs over the iterable.
range produces arithmetic progressions.
zip aggregates elements from multiple iterables.
list.reverse() reverses the list in place.

cases.name: long_context
documents: This paragraph is long and mostly filler text … nothing about networking standards here.
HTTP/1.1 was defined primarily in RFC 7230–7235 (obsoleting RFC 2616).
Transport protocols include TCP and UDP; HTTP sits at the application layer.
Another filler paragraph with unrelated content.

cases.name: es_multilingual
documents: La noche estrellada fue pintada por Vincent van Gogh en 1889.
Pablo Picasso pintó el Guernica.
Salvador Dalí es un pintor surrealista español.
